name: Link Archiver
description: Automatically archives links posted to Mattermost channels. Supports multiple archival methods configurable by MIME type.

settings_schema.header: Configure the Link Archiver plugin. Set up MIME type mappings to specify which archival tool to use for different content types.
settings_schema.footer: For detailed configuration of MIME type mappings, use the admin settings UI.

settings.help_text: Configure which archival tool to use for different MIME types. Use wildcards like 'image/*' to match all image types.
